attributes.action: Stop paying the politicians until they get this Brexit mess sorted out.
attributes.additional_details: You only have to watch the news to see the evidence! Every day people scoring points instead of sitting down and agreeing to resolve it. Each blaming each other. If they were employed by a company they would have been sacked by now.
attributes.background: Look it does not matter what side of the debate you are on. We need to get Brexit sorted out either way. They have WASTED 2 years and have taken our hard earned taxes to mess about and line there own pockets. Its about time we let them know enough is enough.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
